featured.text: Which of the following describes the order of changes in the features of a blackspot angelfish during gender change? (A) Size  behavior  color  stripes.
According to the passage, what triggers the gender change in the blackspot angelfish? (A) Dangers to the group.
One particular kind of angelfish, the blackspot angelfish, has a special capability that allows it to change gender from female to male.

definition.zh_def: 黑點；污點，通常指在植物或物體上出現的黑色斑點或缺陷。
definition.en_def: A dark spot or blemish, often found on plants or objects.
definition.example: The rose leaves had a blackspot that indicated a fungal infection.
